Mesdames,

Je viens de recevoir un appel de la part d’AIG qui m’informe qu’après recherches sur Info Clipper, l’adresse du siège social de Christofle est indiquée ci-dessous.  Il est urgent de me confirmer cette adresse et m’indiquer les coorodnées téléphoniques et emails des personnes à contacter pour l’envoi du contrat et le règlement de la prime.

 

Nous avons maintenant un courtier local qui demande également les coordonnées téléphoniques et emails des personnes à contacter pour l’envoi du contrat et le règlement de la prime.

 

A noter le principe au Japon Cash before cover : La prime doit être réglée afin que les garanties ne soient acquises ; Merci  

 

Dear All , I just received a call from AIG informing that after research on  Info Clipper , the address of Christofle's head office is indicated below. 

It is urgent to confirm this address and give me the telephone numbers and emails of the people to contact to be able to send the policy and settle the premium. 

Note the principle in Japan is Cash before cover: The premium must be paid so that the guarantees are acquired; 

 

We now have a local broker who also asks for the telephone and email details of the people to contact for sending the contract and paying the premium.

Thank you to revert quickly and All the best. 



 

 

 

 

Joe Nasr

Top urgent Thank you

 

Dear Hagop, Dear All,

AIG replied to your request last night and below our free translation :

 

Good evening Mr. NASR,

 

Policy 7.109.766 issued from France de facto covers claims brought to the attention of the Insured on French territory.

 

Concerning entities present in Germany and Japan:

 

- For Germany: in accordance with the International Program annex, the Insured's German entities are covered from France via the LPS (Free Provision of Service). I am not sure of the interest in establishing a local policy generating an additional cost.

o If you are looking for a local policy, please confirm:

* The name (Christofle Deutschland GmbH) and address of the entity (PLEASE COMMUNICATE TO US)

* The name and contact details of the partner broker in Germany for setting up the Integrated Local Policy

Additional Premium 3 500€

 

- For Japan, please provide:

* The name and address of the local entity

* The name and contact details of the partner broker in Japan

* The loss statistics if the entity was previously covered locally

* Confirmation that the activity is the same as that listed in the MASTER contract

* The turnover of the local entity

The final premium depends on the information above , but the minimum will be  3 500€

 

 

I draw your attention to the fact that :

 

*	Japan and China are a Cash Before Cover country. A quick decision must be made regarding the setting up of a local policy.

Conditions tarifaires :      Pricing conditions

 

L’article 6 « Prime » des Conditions Particulières est remplacé par ce qui suit :

 

6.                   Prime

________________________________

 

Sur la base du chiffre d’affaires 2023 de 94.829.000 € :  Based on a turn nover of  94.829.000 € 

 

La prime annuelle du programme est portée à 42.000 € hors taxes et hors frais, dont :  Annuel premium 42 000€ Excluding Taxes and Fees.

 

*	Prime police Master :   Master policy 28 000€ Excluding Taxes and Fees.

Prime forfaitaire annuelle : 28.000 € hors taxes et hors frais.

 

*	Primes polices locales :  Premium local policies : China + Spain + Great Britain + Hong Kong 3 500€ x 4 = 14 000€

Chine, Espagne, Grande-Bretagne, Hong-Kong : la prime forfaitaire annuelle est fixée à 3.500 € pour chacune des polices locales (soit 4 x 3.500 € = 14 000 €) ;

Soit un total de 14.000 € au titre des polices locales.

 

La prime est payable dans son intégralité dans un délai de trente (30) jours à compter de la date de prise d’effet du contrat définie au paragraphe 7. « Effet et durée du contrat » ci-dessous.

The premium is payable in full within thirty (30) days from the effective date of the contract defined in paragraph 7. “Effect and term of the contract” below.

 

L'Assuré s'engage à fournir à la compagnie AIG, sous peine de l'application des dispositions de l'article 8.1 des Conditions Générales dans les deux (2) mois qui suivent la date d'échéance annuelle du contrat, le montant du Chiffre d'Affaires hors taxes.

 

The Insured undertakes to provide the company AIG, subject to the application of the provisions of article 8.1 of the General Conditions within two (2) months following the annual expiry date of the contract, the amount of the Turnover excluding taxes.
